name: Capybro
description:
You're a capybara on the way to the spa. As nature's bro, you help each animal you encounter with whatever problems they may be having.

Features:

  • Play as a capybara. (World's largest rodent)
  • You can change the name of every animal NPC you see in game. (Name them after your friends)
  • Gain Bro Points as you help animal friends. (Collect them all!)
  • Press F to make capybara noises. (What sounds do a capybara make?)
  • Different minigames and challenges. (Like the balloon game or perilous platforming)
  • Multiple achievements. (Including completing the game without running)
  • Carry butterflies and frogs on your head. (also birds)
